name: The Cosmic Conspiracy
description: The stardust theft was just the beginning. A deeper conspiracy involving intergalactic smugglers has been uncovered. Investigate further to expose the truth.

clue_d.name: Smuggler's Network
clue_d.description: Agent Shadow has uncovered evidence of a vast intergalactic smuggling operation. The stardust theft was just one small part of a much larger criminal enterprise.
clue_d.hint: Agent Shadow has been investigating this case for months.
clue_d.conversation_lead: Agent Shadow is eager to discuss his investigation findings but speaks in hushed tones. He might share classified information about criminal networks, smuggling operations, or ongoing investigations if asked about his work, classified matters, or what he's discovered. Guide conversations toward investigative topics.

clue_e.name: System Sabotage
clue_e.description: Circuit-7 discovered that the space train's navigation systems were deliberately tampered with to create a longer stop at the previous station, giving the smugglers more time to operate.
clue_e.hint: Circuit-7 has been analyzing the ship's systems for malfunctions.
clue_e.conversation_lead: Circuit-7 is concerned about system malfunctions and has been running diagnostics. He might discuss navigation problems, system tampering, or technical sabotage if asked about ship systems, navigation issues, or technical problems. Steer toward technical discussions.
